name: Alien Material Conversion kit
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Alien Activation Crystal" "268478" #L "Inactive Alien Material Conversion kit" "268510" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Alien Activation Crystal + Inactive Alien Material Conversion kit = #L "Alien Material Conversion kit" "268509" Skills: | 450ME | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Used for creating #L "Alien Tank Armor" "/tell recipe 587"
